author: sourceforge-skipoles
msg: Added the ability to change the character encoding for an application via the recommended approach of using a servlet filter

author: jdonnerstag
msg: localized contrib component and updated related example

author: jdonnerstag
msg: merged PageableListViewNavigationWithMargin functionality into PageableListViewNavigation and removed PageableListViewNavigationWithMargin. See email for more details

author: jdonnerstag
msg: added an additional apps setting to change default behaviour of always using "wicket" as well, even though componentNameAttribute has been changed. Without this option Wicket-based pre-processors can not be build (see emails for additional infos)

author: jonl
msg: Changed version concept to "revision" because it makes more sense in revision management.  Now the initial Page doesn't /have/ a revision (because it hasn't been revised), so it's revision number is "-1".  When the page gets revised, the IPageRevisionManager will create revision 0.
Also added a trivial change so Gili can invalidate rendered images.
